mapper.insert: INSERT INTO singo(singono, contents, rdate, memberno, trashno, files, filesaved,thumb,filesize) VALUES(community_seq.nextval, #{contents}, sysdate, #{memberno}, #{trashno}, #{files}, #{filesaved}, #{thumb}, #{filesize})
mapper.select: SELECT singo.singono, singo.contents, singo.rdate, singo.memberno, singo.trashno, singo.files, member.nickname, trash.name FROM singo,member,trash where singo.memberno=member.memberno AND singo.trashno=trash.trashno ORDER BY rdate DESC

SELECT singono, contents, rdate, memberno, trashno, files FROM singo WHERE trashno IN (SELECT trashno FROM trash WHERE name LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%') OR memberno IN (SELECT memberno FROM member WHERE name LIKE '%' || #{word}|| '%') OR contents LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%' ORDER BY rdate ASC
